content: {"name": "Our Lady of Guadalupe Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Designed to serve the Hispanic community (you must be Hispanic to receive services). Appointment required by calling 211. You must show photo ID and proof of address on your first visit; after your first visit, you only have to show ID.\n\nSee more information & updates at https://www.facebook.com/ourladyofguadalupecenter/", "email": "", "url": "https://cssmain.wpengine.com/our-lady-of-guadalupe-center/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "405 Industry Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Hilltop", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43204", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9628851, "longitude": -83.0894179}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 340-7061", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Provide prepacked bags or boxes of food"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Spanish Available"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
